location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘View east from J Abab at head of Wadi Kurim, opposite Al Husen’

mods.abstract: Black and white reproduction of an illustration of mountainous terrain, seen from J Abab [Jabal ‘Abbāb], with the Tiban Valley [Wādī Tiban] in the foreground. The most prominent peaks are labelled with transliterated names, and in some instances also with compass bearings. The illustration is signed Major J K Tod, and dated March 1903.
